zh: 信驊科技發布第一代伺服管理處理器
位於新竹科學園區的信驊科技，這家高度創新的fabless Soc –centric IC設計公司很高興地於2005年10月發布它們第一代的伺服管理處理器。AST2000為一結合了VGA/2D圖形控制器、BMC控制器及KVM Over IP控制器的高級矽晶片。它可提供伺服器功能齊全且先進的系統管理。
信驊科技董事長林鴻明先生表示：“ 我們的使命是提供伺服器安全且功能齊全的遠端操作存取技術，使得 IT管理員可以隨時隨地的存取控制，我們最新研發這項符合成本效益的SOC可充分支援遠端管理功能。”
關於 ASPEED信驊科技股份有限公司“信驊科技”成立於2004年11月，為一家高度創新的fabless半導體公司。致力於提供先進的SOC中央運算產品，包含矽晶片、IP以及相關軟體產品，此產品之應用目標為多媒體、影像與網路功能。欲了解更多訊息，請參訪ASPEED官方網站 http://www.ASPEEDTECH.com
媒體聯絡方式：吳俐俐行銷暨業務部資深行銷專員連絡電話：886-955-988-421Lili_wu@aspeedtech.com
en: ASPEED Announced 1’st Generation of Server Management Processor

Hsinchu, Taiwan, Oct, 2005 - ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless SoC-centric IC design house is excited to announce its 1st generation of server management processor. AST2000 is a high-end silicon chip incorporating VGA/2D Graphics Controller, BMC Controller and KVM over IP Controller. It brings fully featured advanced system management to server.

“Our mission is to provide secure, fully featured remote access to the server that gives IT administrator access from anywhere and anytime.  Our new innovative cost-effective SOC can fully support remote management functionality.” said Chris Lin President of ASPEED Technology.

About ASPEED Technology Inc.ASPEED Technology Inc., a highly innovative fabless company founded in Nov. 2004, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, devotes itself to providing silicon chips, silicon IPs and software products that enable sophisticated SOC-centric multimedia, graphics and network applications. For more detailed information, please visit ASPEED website at http://ww.ASPEEDTECH.com
